00023 #ifndef DAZ_T_SHARED_POINTER_H
00024 #define DAZ_T_SHARED_POINTER_H
00025 
00026 /******************************
00027     Include files
00028 ******************************/
00029 
00030 #include "dzgeneraldefs.h"
00031 
00032 /*******************************
00033     Class definitions
00034 *******************************/
00035 
00036 template <class DataType>
00037 class DzTSharedPointer {
00038 public:
00039     DzTSharedPointer() : m_ptr( NULL ) { }
00040     DzTSharedPointer( DataType *ptr ) : m_ptr( ptr ) {
00041         if( m_ptr )
00042             m_ptr->ref();
00043     }
00044 
00045     DzTSharedPointer( const DzTSharedPointer<DataType> &obj ) : m_ptr( obj.m_ptr ) {
00046         if( m_ptr )
00047             m_ptr->ref();
00048     }
00049 
00050     ~DzTSharedPointer() {
00051         if( m_ptr )
00052             m_ptr->unref();
00053     }
00054 
00055     DzTSharedPointer<DataType>& operator=( const DzTSharedPointer<DataType> &obj ) { return *this = obj.m_ptr; }
00056     DzTSharedPointer<DataType>& operator=( DataType *ptr ) 
00057     {
00058         if( m_ptr == ptr )
00059             return *this;
00060         DataType    *old = m_ptr;
00061         if( ptr )
00062             ptr->ref();
00063         
00064         m_ptr = ptr;
00065         
00066         if( old )
00067             old->unref();
00068 
00069         return *this;
00070     }
00071 
00072     bool    isUnique() { return m_ptr ? (m_ptr->getRefCount() < 2) : true; }
00073     bool    operator==( const DzTSharedPointer<DataType> &obj ) const { return (m_ptr == obj.m_ptr); }
00074     bool    operator==( const DataType *ptr ) const { return (m_ptr == ptr); }
00075     bool    operator!=( const DzTSharedPointer<DataType> &obj ) const { return !(m_ptr == obj.m_ptr); }
00076     bool    operator!=( const DataType *ptr ) const { return !(m_ptr == ptr); }
00077     bool    operator!() const { return (m_ptr == NULL); }
00078     operator DataType *() const { return m_ptr; }
00079     DataType*       operator->() { return m_ptr; }
00080     const DataType* operator->() const { return m_ptr; }
00081     DataType&       operator*() { return *m_ptr; }
00082     const DataType& operator*() const { return *m_ptr; }
00083 
00084 private:
00085     DataType    *m_ptr;
00086 };
00087 
00088 #endif // DAZ_T_SHARED_POINTER_H
